title: Amitaba Coffee and Am Thuc Chay
description: A vegetarian cafe/restaurant in District 10 offering both a full vegan menu and a cafe drink menu. The food menu includes noodles, rice dishes, soups and other Vietnamese items. The cafe drink menu includes milk, yogurt and eggs in their drinks, and offers coffees, smoothies and ice cream. Indoor and outdoor seating. Amitaba is the name for one version of Buddha.
